blog.name: poplitealqueen
blog.title: Live bravely in the time you have and smile at the void.

summary: Fun fact, one of my favorite scenes in any of the Harry Potter movies is when Voldemort hugs Draco in The Deathly Hollows Part...
body:
Fun fact, one of my favorite scenes in any of the Harry Potter movies is when Voldemort hugs Draco in The Deathly Hollows Part 2.

There’s a few reasons for it. The most obvious one is that it’s just so goddamn funny. Okay, yeah, I can see what they were trying to go for with it, and if the scene had been in the book the disgust/horror/pity would have come across a helluva lot better I think, but watching it on the screen? It’s funny. I chuckle every time I see it. How can you not?

Now for the less obvious reasons.

I like what it shows about Voldemort’s character. He’s the Big Bad, astoundingly powerful, a villain to end all villains, and yet the guy doesn’t even know how to hug. It makes you pity him, or at least it did for me. The fact that affection is so far out of his reach that he can’t convey it through something as simple and human as a hug – it’s just plain sad. It’s like he read a how-to manual on being human, and this terrified kid is just the unfortunate test subject of what’s likely the only hug Voldemort has ever given in his life. Congrats, I guess?

And then we have Draco, which brings us to my last (and personally favorite) reason why I love this scene.

Imagine how terrifying it would be to be *hugged by Voldemort*. His wand is right there (seriously, watch the scene and it’s resting against Draco’s throat the entire time), *him* right there. This monstrous shadow of a man, and you’re close enough to feel his heart beat or, worse, not (he’s alive, but how alive is he? Does he have a beating heart, does he breathe, is his skin warm to the touch?). What’s Draco supposed to do? Hug him back?? Nope. Nu-uh. No. Voldemort putting his arms around Draco… Man, it gives me goosebumps. It’s like a boa constrictor wrapping around its prey. That’s not a hug; that’s death waiting to happen. You can’t do anything except go limp and hope to god it doesn’t decide to devour you whole.

If Draco got over everything else that happened during this time, that hug would be the one thing he couldn’t. Which is funny when spoken out loud “The most terrifying thing that happened to me in the Second Wizarding War where people died was a hug”, but when you stop to think about it? Really *really* think about it? That would be the most terrifying thing; it’s prime Boggart material. There’s nothing scarier than knowing monsters can be human. Nothing more bone-chilling and nightmare-inducing than having an action so innately reassuring done by something so innately inhuman. In the midst of all that death and destruction, getting a hug from the guy that caused it all? Nobody wanted to be Draco in that moment, except maybe Bellatrix.

blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTER IS DEAD.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 13+ YEARS
 Ever wanted to invent your own potions...
caption:
YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTER IS DEAD.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 13+ YEARS

Ever wanted to invent your own potions professor? Keen to explore crime in Knockturn Alley? Curious about the life of a St. Mungo’s healer? Want to write the life of a world-famous quidditch star? Author an auror’s fall from grace? All this and more is possible at JACFC! If you’re not sure where to begin, we’ve got loads of flexible, diverse CHARACTER REQUESTS waiting.

13 years online proves something magical is happening at JACFC!

blog.name: incorrecthogwartsmysteryquotes
blog.title: Incorrect quotes from "Hogwarts Mystery"
blog.description: The quotes are based on the characters from the game "Harry Potter: hogwarts mystery", because we can never have enough Harry Potter characters. Feel free to message me, submit something or send an ask about anything, except for pineapples. Tags are weird ok.

summary:
*Barnaby is guarding the way to a cursed vault and won't let the group pass through*
MC:  okay, let's handle this logically....
body:
*Barnaby is guarding the way to a cursed vault and won’t let the group pass through*

MC: okay, let’s handle this logically. What exactly have you sworn?

Barnaby: I have sworn on my life’s blood, none shall pass this way without MY permission!

MC: Well… May we have your permission?

Barnaby: well I, uh… I… That is, uh… Hm… Yes?
